title: MEASUREHEAD / FASCHA DQ
description: Ask Measurhead if he knows way to turn back time and have converstaion about True Men in his mum's office.,

dialogueTree.title: You: ""I need to find a way to turn back..."
dialogueTree.text: "I need to find a way to turn back time."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Goddamnit..." mumbles the lieutena..."
links.text: "Goddamnit..." mumbles the lieutenant. "It's becoming a thing now, huh?"

links.title: You: ""Kim, you cannot even *begin* to co..."
links.text: "Kim, you cannot even *begin* to comprehend the importance of this."

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No, I cannot," he agrees. "Just ma..."
links.text: "No, I cannot," he agrees. "Just make it quick, please."

links.title: You: ""It's a harmless quirk. Can't you j..."
links.text: "It's a harmless quirk. Can't you just roll with it?"

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Another one?" The lieutenant lets..."
links.text: "Another one?" The lieutenant lets out a sigh. "Just make it quick please."

links.title: You: "Ignore him."
links.text: Ignore him.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""No," the lieutenant shakes his hea..."
links.text: "No," the lieutenant shakes his head. "You don't. You need to help me find out who killed our hanged man."

links.title: Measurehead: ""MANAGED TO LEARN THE REALITY RHIZO..."
links.text: "MANAGED TO LEARN THE REALITY RHIZOME -- AND NEXT UP IS RETURNING TO THE PAST?" The giant locks eyes with you. His face is serious...

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU DON'T HAVE IT IN YOU. BE GRATE..."
links.text: "YOU DON'T HAVE IT IN YOU. BE GRATEFUL FOR THAT."

links.title: You: ""Wait, what exactly am I lacking?""
links.text: "Wait, what exactly am I lacking?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOUR NEED TO STEER EVERY CONVERSAT..."
links.text: "YOUR NEED TO STEER EVERY CONVERSATION TOWARDS YOUR OWN PERSONA IS A SIGN OF LOW SELF-ESTEEM."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Stop boring Measurehead. He talks..."
links.text: "Stop boring Measurehead. He talks about *big* things and you only talk about yourself!"

links.title: You: ""So it *is* possible to go back?""
links.text: "So it *is* possible to go back?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""ANYTHING IS POSSIBLE. JUST NOT FOR..."
links.text: "ANYTHING IS POSSIBLE. JUST NOT FOR YOU."

links.title: You: ""I internalized your race theory an..."
links.text: "I internalized your race theory and that was *hard*."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YES. FOR YOU I IMAGINE IT WAS. DON..."
links.text: "YES. FOR YOU I IMAGINE IT WAS. DON'T THINK THAT I AM NOW OBLIGED TO BE PART OF YOUR LITTLE *GROWING* SPURT. IT IS NOT GOING ANYWHERE."

links.title: Suggestion: "He just needs some convincing befor..."
links.text: He just needs some convincing before you can talk to him mano a mano.

links.title: You: ""Can't you just give me a straight..."
links.text: "Can't you just give me a straight answer for once?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""DO NOT THINK ME INTRODUCING YOU TO..."
links.text: "DO NOT THINK ME INTRODUCING YOU TO RACE SCIENCE MEANS I'M NOW PART OF YOUR *GROWING* PROCESS -- IT DOES NOT LOOK PROMISING."

links.title: You: ""I get it, you're upset because I b..."
links.text: "I get it, you're upset because I beat you up."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU BESTED ME IN A VIOLENT PHYSICA..."
links.text: "YOU BESTED ME IN A VIOLENT PHYSICAL CONFRONTATION, TRUE, BUT I DON'T *OWE* YOU AN INTELLECTUAL ONE."

links.title: Half Light: "Huh, good... no more confrontations..."
links.text: Huh, good... no more confrontations!

links.title: You: ""Can't you just give me a straight..."
links.text: "Can't you just give me a straight answer for once?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU DID BEST ME IN A VIOLENT PHYSI..."
links.text: "YOU DID BEST ME IN A VIOLENT PHYSICAL CONFRONTATION, BUT I DON'T *OWE* YOU AN INTELLECTUAL ONE."

links.title: You: ""Can't you just give me a straight..."
links.text: "Can't you just give me a straight answer for once?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""IT'S SIMPLE. I AM JUST NOT INTERES..."
links.text: "IT'S SIMPLE. I AM JUST NOT INTERESTED IN YOUR IMPOTENT OBSESSION WITH THE PAST."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU WANT TO RETURN TO THE PAST?" T..."
links.text: "YOU WANT TO RETURN TO THE PAST?" The giant locks eyes with you. His face is serious...

links.title: Measurehead: ""THAT SURPRISES NO ONE. AND YET YOU..."
links.text: "THAT SURPRISES NO ONE. AND YET YOU *STILL* FEEL ENTITLED TO RETURN TO THE PAST?" The giant locks eyes with you. His face is serious...

links.title: Measurehead: ""OBSERVE," he turns to the women. "..."
links.text: "OBSERVE," he turns to the women. "LIKE A PEASANT HOPING TO BED A NOBLEWOMAN, THE HAM SANDWICH IS REACHING STRAIGHT FOR THE *ADVANCED* CONCEPTS. NO HUMILITY, AWARENESS, OR RESPECT."

links.title: Measurehead's Babe: ""Get your dirty hick-dick away from..."
links.text: "Get your dirty hick-dick away from these advanced concepts, peasant!"

links.title: Measurehead: ""TO COMPREHEND TIME YOU MUST POSSES..."
links.text: "TO COMPREHEND TIME YOU MUST POSSESS AT LEAST A BASIC UNDERSTANDING OF HOW *REALITY* WORKS, WHAT THE RULES ARE. THE LOOK OF INFINITE ASTOUNDMENT IN YOUR EYES SAYS YOU HAVE *NO IDEA*."

links.title: You: ""Hey, I'm a police officer, I know..."
links.text: "Hey, I'm a police officer, I know *plenty*!"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE CONCEPTS YOU REACH FOR ARE FAR..."
links.text: "THE CONCEPTS YOU REACH FOR ARE FAR BEYOND YOU, PUPA. WITHOUT THE NECESSARY VOCABULARY YOU ARE ONLY WASTING MY TIME." He frowns. "EDUCATE YOURSELF FIRST, TALK TO PEOPLE, AND UNDERSTAND THE BASICS."

links.title: Endurance: "This again? But you've learned the..."
links.text: This again? But you've learned the basics... Guess we need to return to Mr. Monolith once we've figured out what else is missing from the curriculum.

links.title: Endurance: "This again? Guess we need to return..."
links.text: This again? Guess we need to return to Mr. Monolith once we've gotten a better understanding of the whole 'reality thing'.

links.title: Endurance: "He's got a point. You're never goin..."
links.text: He's got a point. You're never going to turn back time if you don't understand how the pieces move. Let's find someone *rich* (that's how you know they've got the basics down) and pick their brain.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "A studious approach... Seems like a..."
links.text: A studious approach... Seems like a good direction. Turn it into *science*!

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Just remember, minimum effort -- le..."
links.text: Just remember, minimum effort -- let things get too brainy and *BANG*! You're a binoclard. No one wants that.

links.title: Measurehead: ""COME BACK TO ME WHEN YOU'VE MASTER..."
links.text: "COME BACK TO ME WHEN YOU'VE MASTERED THE RHIZOME." He crosses his arms, towering above you with a menacing shadow.

links.title: You: ""I admit I've re-entered this reali..."
links.text: "I admit I've re-entered this reality quite recently. Things are still hazy."

links.title: You: ""You're right -- I don't even know..."
links.text: "You're right -- I don't even know *who I am*..." (Look at your hands in bewilderment.)

dialogueTree.title: Measurehead: ""SO... WOMEN, HUH?" The Semenese su..."
dialogueTree.text: "SO... WOMEN, HUH?" The Semenese supraman stretches on the couch like a giant tattooed cat.

links.title: Composure: "His shoulders relax, tension is lea..."
links.text: His shoulders relax, tension is leaving him.

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Strange, he seems different in here..."
links.text: Strange, he seems different in here. Less 'monolithic' somehow.

links.title: Inland Empire: "The room feels soporific in its sil..."
links.text: The room feels soporific in its silence, dust particles twirling around in the air...

links.title: You: "(Nod first.) "Women.""
links.text: (Nod first.) "Women."

links.title: Measurehead: ""WOMEN," he repeats."
links.text: "WOMEN," he repeats.

links.title: You: ""I like women.""
links.text: "I like women."

links.title: Measurehead: ""AND? THAT'S WHAT YOU WANTED TO TAL..."
links.text: "AND? THAT'S WHAT YOU WANTED TO TALK ABOUT?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""WHAT IS THIS *REALLY* ABOUT?""
links.text: "WHAT IS THIS *REALLY* ABOUT?"

links.title: You: ""It's about love.""
links.text: "It's about love."

links.title: Measurehead: ""RENOUNCING THE GHOUL IS ALREADY CL..."
links.text: "RENOUNCING THE GHOUL IS ALREADY CLEARING THE FOG FROM YOUR MIND. DON'T THINK I DIDN'T NOTICE. MEN ONLY WANT TO REVERSE TIME FOR ONE REASON -- LOVE."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THEY *SAY* IT'S ABOUT HONOUR, JUST..."
links.text: "THEY *SAY* IT'S ABOUT HONOUR, JUSTICE, REVENGE, REGRET, REDEMPTION, AND A PLETHORA OF FALSE REASONS, BUT FURTHER BACK -- DEEPER IN -- IT IS ALWAYS LOVE THAT DRIVES THEM."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I CAN BARELY HEAR YOUR WORDS THROU..."
links.text: "I CAN BARELY HEAR YOUR WORDS THROUGH THE VOICE OF AL-GUL, BUT IT SPEAKS TRUTH. MEN ONLY WANT TO REVERSE TIME FOR ONE REASON -- LOVE."

links.title: You: ""Culture-victory. The kipts and the..."
links.text: "Culture-victory. The kipts and the Kojkos are showing..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THAT IS A LIE YOU ADMINISTER YOURS..."
links.text: "THAT IS A LIE YOU ADMINISTER YOURSELF. LIKE HEART MEDICINE. GO WITHOUT IT ONE DAY AND YOUR HEART WILL STOP."

links.title: Measurehead: ""MEN ONLY WANT TO REVERSE TIME FOR..."
links.text: "MEN ONLY WANT TO REVERSE TIME FOR ONE REASON. THEY *SAY* IT'S ABOUT HONOUR, JUSTICE, REVENGE, REGRET, REDEMPTION, AND A PLETHORA OF FALSE REASONS, BUT FURTHER BACK -- DEEPER IN -- IT IS ALWAYS LOVE THAT DRIVES THEM."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "René certainly seemed to agree with..."
links.text: René certainly seemed to agree with that.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "This *can't* be true for the Racist..."
links.text: This *can't* be true for the Racist Lorry Driver -- guy didn't have an ounce of love in his life!

links.title: Logic: "No-no, Gary seems way too scientifi..."
links.text: No-no, Gary seems way too scientific to get involved in some messy love conundrum.

links.title: Measurehead: ""I'M GOING TO DO YOU A KINDNESS, PU..."
links.text: "I'M GOING TO DO YOU A KINDNESS, PUPA. I'M GOING TO SHARE A SECRET WITH YOU. HERE IS THE SECRET: THERE IS NO LOVE IN THE PAST. ONLY THE PRESENT."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE PAST IS MADE OF STATIC IMAGES,..."
links.text: "THE PAST IS MADE OF STATIC IMAGES, DISTORTED MEMORIES, DEMENTED NOSTALGIA. THIS, THE PRESENT -- WITH ALL ITS POSSIBILITIES, INNUMERABLE HITS AND MISSES -- IS FAR SUPERIOR. IT IS A *LIVING* ORGANISM."

links.title: Conceptualization: "Hmm... maybe if you inquire more ab..."
links.text: Hmm... maybe if you inquire more about the present, you'll figure out the secret of returning to the past.

links.title: Empathy: "What about all the women that surro..."
links.text: What about all the women that surround him -- is the love extended for them as well?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "There's something else you need to..."
links.text: There's something else you need to clear up with him, man to man -- why you knocked him out.

links.title: You: ""What's so great about the present?""
links.text: "What's so great about the present?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""LOOK AROUND YOU. LOOK AT THE ADVAN..."
links.text: "LOOK AROUND YOU. LOOK AT THE ADVANCEMENTS IN THE SEXUAL SCIENCES -- ALL THE NOVEL TECHNIQUES, ACCESSORIES, PRESERVATIVES, MASSAGE OILS, LUBRICATION SALVES, ABORTION CLINICS..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""AND THE WOMEN. WOMEN WHO SHAVE AND..."
links.text: "AND THE WOMEN. WOMEN WHO SHAVE AND ARE CAPABLE OF UNDERSTANDING CONCEPTS LIKE POLYAMORY AND *COITUS CASUALIS* -- THE KOJKO AND THEIR PROMISCUITY ARE AT THE FOREFRONT OF ALL THAT."

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Novel techniques? *Your* techniques..."
links.text: Novel techniques? *Your* techniques were probably last novel during the Franconigerian times. You *need* those techniques, *bratan* -- to survive!

links.title: Authority: "Who cares about sexual partners and..."
links.text: Who cares about sexual partners and their promiscuity when you've got *the fate and honour of Revachol* on your shoulders?

links.title: Drama: "But promisssscuity leads to dddrama..."
links.text: But promisssscuity leads to dddrama!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Sounds *fun* -- it's high time you..."
links.text: Sounds *fun* -- it's high time you incorporated some of these things into your daily life.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Hmm, so maybe *that's* what's up be..."
links.text: Hmm, so maybe *that's* what's up between him and the Kojkas...

links.title: You: ""Hold on, what are these *novel tec..."
links.text: "Hold on, what are these *novel techniques* you mentioned?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU'RE ASKING ME TO SHARE THE SACR..."
links.text: "YOU'RE ASKING ME TO SHARE THE SACRED TECHNIQUES THAT I'VE GATHERED AND INTERNALIZED ON MY LIFE'S JOURNEY? WITH YOU, A STRANGER?"

links.title: Composure: "Watch out! He's getting defensive."
links.text: Watch out! He's getting defensive.

links.title: You: ""Yes, please.""
links.text: "Yes, please."

links.title: Measurehead: ""DO NOT THINK THE SERENITY OF MY MO..."
links.text: "DO NOT THINK THE SERENITY OF MY MOTHER'S OFFICE MAKES ME FORGET WE ARE BIOLOGICAL COMPETITORS -- ALBEIT UNEVENLY MATCHED."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU ARE MORE LIKELY TO GET THE COA..."
links.text: "YOU ARE MORE LIKELY TO GET THE COALITION TO SIGN OVER THEIR WARSHIPS, THAN GET THESE... *WEAPONS* OF PLEASURE AND CONTROL OUT OF ME."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THIS KNOWLEDGE *NEVER* PASSES FROM..."
links.text: "THIS KNOWLEDGE *NEVER* PASSES FROM A MAN TO ANOTHER MAN. NOT EVEN FROM A FATHER TO HIS SON. THIS PATH IS TO BE TAKEN IN *ABSOLUTE* SOLITUDE."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "He's flexing as he says these last..."
links.text: He's flexing as he says these last words -- it seems to be involuntary.

links.title: You: ""No, of course not -- I was just te..."
links.text: "No, of course not -- I was just testing you."

links.title: You: ""Maybe just one or two?""
links.text: "Maybe just one or two?"

links.title: Half Light: "No! No. No-no-no-no. NO! You're not..."
links.text: No! No. No-no-no-no. NO! You're not. You are *not* fishing for his sacred techniques -- they're not worth dying over!

links.title: You: ""Promiscuity -- you mean the *cock..."
links.text: "Promiscuity -- you mean the *cock carousel*." (Twirl your hand around in the air.)

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU USE VULGAR HUMOUR TO DISTRACT..."
links.text: "YOU USE VULGAR HUMOUR TO DISTRACT YOURSELF FROM THE PAIN THAT WOMEN HAVE CAUSED YOU. IMPOTENT RAGE AT THEIR PROMISCUITY WILL NOT HEAL YOU. AND IT *REPELS* WOMEN."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU HAVE TO SHED THIS INFANTILE SH..."
links.text: "YOU HAVE TO SHED THIS INFANTILE SHELL IF YOU *EVER* WISH TO FIND A WORTHY MATE."

links.title: Perception: "Everything's revolving around women..."
links.text: Everything's revolving around women and sex with this guy... What's that about?

links.title: You: ""I don't think anyone's being promi..."
links.text: "I don't think anyone's being promiscuous with me. I wish they were, though."

links.title: Measurehead: ""DESPERATION. WISHFUL THINKING. CON..."
links.text: "DESPERATION. WISHFUL THINKING. CONFUSION. NO WOMAN WANTS TO CREATE A LASTING PSYCHOSEXUAL BOND WITH A MAN IN THRALL TO HIS BIOLOGICAL IMPULSES."

links.title: You: ""The goal of any sane relationship..."
links.text: "The goal of any sane relationship is loyalty, marriage, eternal love. Anything else is just vapid pleasure-seeking."

links.title: Measurehead: ""IT DOES NOT SURPRISE ME THAT THE C..."
links.text: "IT DOES NOT SURPRISE ME THAT THE COMPLEXITIES OF THE PSYCHOSEXUAL BOND BETWEEN A MAN AND A WOMAN REMAIN BEYOND YOUR REACH. INSTEAD YOU CONTINUE TO IDEALISE THE FLAWED AND HALLUCINATORY RELATIONSHIP BETWEEN YOUR PARENTS, HOPING TO CORRECT THEIR MISTAKES."

links.title: You: ""I don't actually care about any of..."
links.text: "I don't actually care about any of that, I'm just here for *Revachol*."

links.title: Measurehead: ""CONTINUOUS DENIAL. YOUR LACK OF PS..."
links.text: "CONTINUOUS DENIAL. YOUR LACK OF PSYCHOSEXUAL SELF-AWARENESS DOES NOT SURPRISE ME. SOMETHING TRAGIC MUST HAVE HAPPENED TO YOU IN THE PAST FOR YOU TO DENY IT SO VIGOROUSLY."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "You *really* have to find out at so..."
links.text: You *really* have to find out at some point what's up with him and the Kojkas...

links.title: You: ""What's up between you and the babe..."
links.text: "What's up between you and the babes?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU ARE TRYING TO INSINUATE SOMETH..."
links.text: "YOU ARE TRYING TO INSINUATE SOMETHING. THIS IMPOTENT PSYCHOLOGICAL MANIPULATION DOES NOT WORK ON ME. SPEAK UP, PUPA."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Now is the time to ask about the sm..."
links.text: Now is the time to ask about the smell -- didn't he say that it is impossible to maintain an erection with the distinct smell of the Kojka?

links.title: You: ""Aren't you bothered by the *potaat..."
links.text: "Aren't you bothered by the *potaat* smell?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""NO. IT TURNS ME ON.""
links.text: "NO. IT TURNS ME ON."

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Interesting... is it some kind of a..."
links.text: Interesting... is it some kind of aphrodisiac then?

links.title: Logic: "There is no *potaat* smell -- just..."
links.text: There is no *potaat* smell -- just making it clear. It's racist rhetoric.

links.title: You: ""I thought you didn't like women of..."
links.text: "I thought you didn't like women of other races -- including Kojkos."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOUR MIND IS UNABLE TO CAPTURE THE..."
links.text: "YOUR MIND IS UNABLE TO CAPTURE THE NUANCES OF THIS PARTICULAR SITUATION. IT EXCEEDS THE LIMITS OF YOUR EMOTIONAL INTELLIGENCE. *AND* YOUR GENETIC IMAGINATION. DO NOT EVEN TRY. "

links.title: You: ""Hey, you're greatly underestimatin..."
links.text: "Hey, you're greatly underestimating my capabilities!"

links.title: Measurehead: ""NO, I AM NOT.""
links.text: "NO, I AM NOT."

links.title: You: ""Aren't you afraid of producing a S..."
links.text: "Aren't you afraid of producing a Semeno-Kojkic chimera?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""PUPA..." He pauses to let the cond..."
links.text: "PUPA..." He pauses to let the condescension set in. "I BELONG TO THE *S.R.S.* INVOLUNTARY OFFSPRING PRODUCTION -- CHIMERIC OR REGULAR -- IS *NOT* AN ISSUE FOR ME."

links.title: Encyclopedia:"S.R.S.? Seems to be missing from yo..."
links.text: S.R.S.? Seems to be missing from your records...

links.title: Authority: "Semenese Race Scientists?"
links.text: Semenese Race Scientists?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "Street Racing Syndicate?"
links.text: Street Racing Syndicate?

links.title: Endurance: "Is it some kind of performance enha..."
links.text: Is it some kind of performance enhancement supplement?

links.title: You: ""Semenese Race Scientists?""
links.text: "Semenese Race Scientists?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE SEMEN RETENTION SOCIETY. IT DO..."
links.text: "THE SEMEN RETENTION SOCIETY. IT DOES NOT SURPRISE ME THAT YOU KNOW NOTHING ABOUT IT. MASTURBATORS ANONYMOUS IS PROBABLY AN ORGANISATION YOU'RE MORE FAMILIAR WITH."

links.title: Measurehead:""THE S.R.S. IS A CLOSED GROUP OF ST..."
links.text: "THE S.R.S. IS A CLOSED GROUP OF STRONG-WILLED INDIVIDUALS WHO HAVE DEDICATED THEMSELVES TO BUILDING UP STRATEGIC SEMEN RESERVES. IT TAKES IRON WILL AND RAZOR-SHARP FOCUS. FAR BEYOND YOUR SPIRITUAL POTENTIAL."

links.title: Volition: "An enormous expenditure of willpowe..."
links.text: An enormous expenditure of willpower to build up strategic semen reserves? You had me at *willpower*. Let's do it!

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Life is all about pleasure... why d..."
links.text: Life is all about pleasure... why deny it?!

links.title: You: ""Hold on, did I get this right -- y..."
links.text: "Hold on, did I get this right -- you never actually climax during sexual intercouse?!"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THIS IS AN OVER-SIMPLIFICATION. BU..."
links.text: "THIS IS AN OVER-SIMPLIFICATION. BUT YES."

links.title: You: ""Sounds *exciting*! How do I join?""
links.text: "Sounds *exciting*! How do I join?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""I JUST TOLD YOU. IT’S NOT MEANT FO..."
links.text: "I JUST TOLD YOU. IT’S NOT MEANT FOR AN AL-GUL ENTHRALLED MIND LIKE YOURS."

links.title: Measurehead: ""ONLY AFTER YEARS AND YEARS OF EMOT..."
links.text: "ONLY AFTER YEARS AND YEARS OF EMOTIONAL, PSYCHOLOGICAL, AND SPIRITUAL *POWERLIFTING* CAN A MAN START LOOKING INTO JOINING THE S.R.S."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I JUST TOLD YOU. YOU DON'T. IT'S N..."
links.text: "I JUST TOLD YOU. YOU DON'T. IT'S NOT MEANT FOR A FEEBLE AND TRAUMATIZED MIND LIKE YOURS."

links.title: You: ""You're right, Masturbators Anonymo..."
links.text: "You're right, Masturbators Anonymous is my kind of jam."

links.title: Measurehead: ""IT'S NOTHING TO BE PROUD OF, PUPA...."
links.text: "IT'S NOTHING TO BE PROUD OF, PUPA. HYSTERICAL MASTURBATION IS BUT ONE OF THE MANY ILLNESSES OF OCCIDENTAL CIVILISATION."

links.title: You: ""How did this conversation end up h..."
links.text: "How did this conversation end up here..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""IF DISCUSSING BODILY FUNCTIONS DIS..."
links.text: "IF DISCUSSING BODILY FUNCTIONS DISTURBS YOU, WE CAN TALK ABOUT SOMETHING ELSE. SOMETHING THAT CORRESPONDS BETTER WITH YOU EMOTIONAL IMMATURITY."

links.title: You: ""Street Racing Syndicate?""
links.text: "Street Racing Syndicate?"

links.title: You: ""Is it a performance enhancement su..."
links.text: "Is it a performance enhancement supplement you're taking?"

links.title: You:""S.R.S.? What are you talking about?""
links.text: "S.R.S.? What are you talking about?"

links.title: You: ""Aren't you afraid that one of them..."
links.text: "Aren't you afraid that one of them might get pregnant?"

links.title: You: ""You're very focused on women and s..."
links.text: "You're very focused on women and sex."

links.title: Measurehead: ""WE ARE LIFE. LIFE IS SEXUALITY. SE..."
links.text: "WE ARE LIFE. LIFE IS SEXUALITY. SEXUALITY *IN COMPETITION* WITH SEXUALITY -- THE SEXUALITY OF OTHER ORGANISMS. THE POINT OF ANY COMPETITION IS TO WIN."

links.title: You: ""Win what exactly?""
links.text: "Win what exactly?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE FUTURE." He lets it set in for..."
links.text: "THE FUTURE." He lets it set in for a while.

links.title: Measurehead: ""IN A BIOLOGICAL SENSE, THE MAN WHO..."
links.text: "IN A BIOLOGICAL SENSE, THE MAN WHOSE ESSENCE, WHOSE GENETIC BLUEPRINT, IS PASSED ON TO THE MOST HOSTS, DOWN TO THE MOST GENERATIONS, FULFILS HIS BIOLOGICAL PURPOSE TO THE GREATEST EXTENT. THIS IS THE LOVE VICTORY."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "What about the Semen Retention Soci..."
links.text: What about the Semen Retention Society?

links.title: Savoir Faire: "He's right -- everything's a contes..."
links.text: He's right -- everything's a contest and only the *shiftiest* competitors win.

links.title: You: ""Wait, what about your Semen Club?""
links.text: "Wait, what about your Semen Club?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""SEMEN RETENTION *SOCIETY*," he cor..."
links.text: "SEMEN RETENTION *SOCIETY*," he corrects you. "I TOLD YOU, THIS IS A SIMPLIFICATION. CLIMAX IS NOT *REQUIRED* FOR VICTORY. IN FACT IT IS DISCOURAGED. A TRUE MAN *RETAINS* HIS ESSENCE."

links.title: Measurehead: ""IT IS FAR MORE MASCULINE TO PASS O..."
links.text: "IT IS FAR MORE MASCULINE TO PASS ON A BLUEPRINT OF YOUR MIND AND YOUR SPIRIT THAN YOUR FLESH. WOMEN GIVE BIRTH TO FLESH AND MEN GIVE BIRTH TO SPIRIT. SPIRIT IS IMMORTAL."

links.title: Conceptualization: "He has a point. While an idea is bo..."
links.text: He has a point. While an idea is born potentially immortal, flesh is always doomed to die.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Spirit is housed in flesh. No one c..."
links.text: Spirit is housed in flesh. No one cares about your fancy 'ideas' if you're getting beaten up behind a bar.

links.title: You: ""There *is* a competitive element t..."
links.text: "There *is* a competitive element to sex, I agree."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOUR AGREEMENT MEANS NOTHING TO ME..."
links.text: "YOUR AGREEMENT MEANS NOTHING TO ME. YOU'RE A MAN *DEFEATED* BY LOVE. IT IS PLAIN TO SEE. IT IS IN YOUR FACE, IN YOUR VOICE, IN YOUR HEART. LOVE TAKES COURAGE -- YOU DID NOT HAVE ENOUGH."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU HAD A LITTLE. TOO LITTLE. THAT..."
links.text: "YOU HAD A LITTLE. TOO LITTLE. THAT IS WHY WE ARE IN MY MOTHER'S OFFICE. YOU HAVE COME TO ME, SEEKING WISDOM IN THE SEXUAL ARTS. DO NOT WASTE THIS OPPORTUNITY ON SYCOPHANTIC PERSONALITY MIRRORING."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Ouch..."
links.text: Ouch...

links.title: Measurehead: ""IT WILL SERVE YOU POORLY IN THE GR..."
links.text: "IT WILL SERVE YOU POORLY IN THE GREAT WAR OF LOVE."

links.title: You: ""Sex is about *cooperation*. It doe..."
links.text: "Sex is about *cooperation*. It doesn't matter how many partners you've had."

links.title: Measurehead: ""SPOKEN LIKE A MAN DEFEATED BY LOVE..."
links.text: "SPOKEN LIKE A MAN DEFEATED BY LOVE. UNABLE TO FACE THE HARSH REALITIES OF NATURE. WE ARE SKY, BUTTERFLIES, RHODODENDRONS, RHINOS. NATURE AGAINST NATURE. LOVE TAKES COURAGE. COURAGE TO FIGHT."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THIS DEFEATIST TALK OF COOPERATION..."
links.text: "THIS DEFEATIST TALK OF COOPERATION IS WHY YOU HAVE NO FUTURE. IT IS ALSO WHY YOU HAVE NO LOVE."

links.title: Empathy: "That's not true. You have the love..."
links.text: That's not true. You have the love of your mother... or do you?

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "Maybe even the love of your friends..."
links.text: Maybe even the love of your friends and colleagues?

links.title: Half Light: "Who needs love if you can wield *fe..."
links.text: Who needs love if you can wield *fear*.

links.title: Logic: "You have cold hard facts to protect..."
links.text: You have cold hard facts to protect you from heartbreak -- and that is enough.

links.title: Esprit de Corps: "You've definitely lost the love of..."
links.text: You've definitely lost the love of your colleagues.

links.title: You: ""You seem to have a set idea of mas..."
links.text: "You seem to have a set idea of masculinity. I wonder where it comes from?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THIS IS NO TIME FOR VAGUE GENERALI..."
links.text: "THIS IS NO TIME FOR VAGUE GENERALITIES. THERE IS SOMETHING ELSE ON YOUR MIND. ASK THE QUESTION YOU INTENDED TO ASK OR FACE YOUR COWARDICE."

links.title: Half Light: "No, this is a *trap*... He will say..."
links.text: No, this is a *trap*... He will say or do something *horrible* if you go down this path...

links.title: Suggestion: "Time to get personal -- he's finall..."
links.text: Time to get personal -- he's finally ready to open up to you.

links.title: You: ""Alright. What made you *you*, Meas..."
links.text: "Alright. What made you *you*, Measurehead?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE ONLY MAN WORTH BEING CALLED A..."
links.text: "THE ONLY MAN WORTH BEING CALLED A MAN -- FATHER JAIRZINHO."

links.title: Inland Empire: "Father Jairzinho? Sounds like some..."
links.text: Father Jairzinho? Sounds like some kind of mystic. Or a magician.

links.title: You: ""Hold on, is this father Jairzinho..."
links.text: "Hold on, is this father Jairzinho a... *mystic*?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""NO. A WELDER.""
links.text: "NO. A WELDER."

links.title: Interfacing: "An honest job for an honest man."
links.text: An honest job for an honest man.

links.title: You: ""And how did he *make* you?""
links.text: "And how did he *make* you?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""FATHER JAIRZINHO MADE ME HARD, WHE..."
links.text: "FATHER JAIRZINHO MADE ME HARD, WHERE MY MOTHER MADE ME SOFT. TOGETHER THEY MADE ME COMPLETE."

links.title: Visual Calculus: "Nothing in the history of things th..."
links.text: Nothing in the history of things that *are* has ever *been* as monolithic as Jean-Luc Measurehead right now. He is an obelisk. A towering phallic obelisk of willpower.

links.title: Shivers: "The hair on you arm stands up as yo..."
links.text: The hair on you arm stands up as you hear wind howl behind the window... An outline of a small bathroom appears in your mind's eye. Above the sink -- in a tumbler -- is a pair of labelled toothbrushes...

links.title: You: "What's written on the toothbrushes?"
links.text: What's written on the toothbrushes?

links.title: Shivers: "One of them is labelled 'Martha' an..."
links.text: One of them is labelled 'Martha' and the other one -- which appears to be a chewing bone -- has 'Jairzinho' carved into it. A shadow falls over the ceramic tumbler...

links.title: You: "Look up."
links.text: Look up.

links.title: Shivers: "An imposing figure with almost myth..."
links.text: An imposing figure with almost mythical proportions fills the entire room. He's hunched over the sink and muscles, like waves on the ocean, roll under his skin with even the smallest of movements.

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Roll or twitch? That guy *must* be..."
links.text: Roll or twitch? That guy *must* be juicing. No way he's natural!

links.title: You: "Wait, 'juicing'?"
links.text: Wait, 'juicing'?

links.title: Physical Instrument: "Big time. TRT, growth hormones, Gra..."
links.text: Big time. TRT, growth hormones, Graadian power injections -- he's on *all* of them.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "Did somebody say *PERFORMANCE ENHAN..."
links.text: Did somebody say *PERFORMANCE ENHANCERS*?!

links.title: You: "What is he doing?"
links.text: What is he doing?

links.title: Shivers: "Shaving -- or about to chop firewoo..."
links.text: Shaving -- or about to chop firewood because... Oh, he *is* shaving! Sliding an enormous axe blade down his bristly chin -- with *grunts* accompanying the process. Steam is emanating from his naked body... The image blurs.

links.title: Volition: "He wasn't even using soap... *incre..."
links.text: He wasn't even using soap... *incredible*.

links.title: You: "Shake it off."
links.text: Shake it off.

links.title: Measurehead: ""LET ME SAY THAT AGAIN: IT IS THE *..."
links.text: "LET ME SAY THAT AGAIN: IT IS THE *BALANCE* BETWEEN SOFT AND HARD THAT MADE ME COMPLETE."

links.title: You: "(Nod thoughtfully.) "Soft and hard..."
links.text: (Nod thoughtfully.) "Soft and hard -- I see..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""FATHER JAIRZINHO WAS VERY WISE. HE..."
links.text: "FATHER JAIRZINHO WAS VERY WISE. HE REALISED THAT IF THE TENDER TOUCH OF MY MOTHER WASN'T OPPOSED I WOULD TURN INTO A..." He pauses to make sure your eyes are locked.

links.title: Measurehead: ""COMPLETE *PUSSY*.""
links.text: "COMPLETE *PUSSY*."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "No, not a pussy!!"
links.text: No, not a pussy!!

links.title: Measurehead: ""SO HE DID WHAT A MAN MUST. HE BECA..."
links.text: "SO HE DID WHAT A MAN MUST. HE BECAME A *COUNTERWEIGHT*. OF IRON. THROUGH SCARCITY, ASCESIS, DISCIPLINE, AND RESPECTFUL DISTANCE EVERY FATHER SHOULD HAVE FOR HIS SON."

links.title: Empathy: "How sad -- this man only ever knew..."
links.text: How sad -- this man only ever knew his mother's love...

links.title: Half Light: "Smells like physical violence... ju..."
links.text: Smells like physical violence... just like with Cuno and his dad.

links.title: Interfacing: "Hopefully he at least taught his so..."
links.text: Hopefully he at least taught his son some welding...

links.title: You: ""Is Jairzinho your biological fathe..."
links.text: "Is Jairzinho your biological father?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YES, I INHERITED MY GENETIC MAKEUP..."
links.text: "YES, I INHERITED MY GENETIC MAKEUP FROM FATHER JAIRZINHO. I AM AN EVOLUTION OF HIM. HE IS IMMORTALISED IN MY ESSENCE EVEN AFTER HIS PHYSICAL BODY EXPIRES."

links.title: Empathy: "The last words are said almost with..."
links.text: The last words are said almost with a longing.

links.title: Reaction Speed: "And by essence he means his 'strate..."
links.text: And by essence he means his 'strategic semen reserve'. A collector, that one.

links.title: Horrific Necktie: "A lot of *semen talk* going around,..."
links.text: A lot of *semen talk* going around, but no one blowing any loads. This party's winding down, *bratan*.

links.title: You: ""Why do you call him Father Jairzin..."
links.text: "Why do you call him Father Jairzinho then?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""BECAUSE FATHER JAIRZINHO IS MY FAT..."
links.text: "BECAUSE FATHER JAIRZINHO IS MY FATHER AND HIS NAME IS JAIRZINHO."

links.title: Authority: "His father taught him *respect*."
links.text: His father taught him *respect*.

links.title: You: ""Did he ever *hit* you? Because it..."
links.text: "Did he ever *hit* you? Because it seems like he did."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE STEREOTYPICAL WORRIES OF A TRA..."
links.text: "THE STEREOTYPICAL WORRIES OF A TRAUMATISED SOCIAL WORKER. THE REALITY DOES NOT CORRESPOND TO YOUR PERSONAL TRAUMA. AND IF IT DID, I WOULD WELCOME IT. A GOOD FIGHT WITH FATHER JAIRZINHO WOULD BE A GREAT HONOUR."

links.title: Reaction Speed: "'Personal trauma'? Is he implying *..."
links.text: 'Personal trauma'? Is he implying *you* were the one who got beaten up by your dad?

links.title: You: ""No, you've misunderstood me. My fa..."
links.text: "No, you've misunderstood me. My father didn't hit me. I don't have any personal trauma."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THIS DENIAL DOES NOT SERVE YOUR SP..."
links.text: "THIS DENIAL DOES NOT SERVE YOUR SPIRIT. YOU ARE LIKE A DOG WITH ITS TAIL BETWEEN ITS LEGS. IT IS VISIBLE TO ALL. IT IS VISIBLE TO WOMEN AND THE REASON WHY YOU HAVEN'T FOUND A WORTHY MATE. OR WHY THE WORTHY MATE WAS STOLEN FROM YOU."

links.title: Pain Threshold: "Strange... there are no memories of..."
links.text: Strange... there are no memories of that recorded anywhere in your body. He's making it up.

links.title: Savoir Faire: "He's making it up to gain an *unfai..."
links.text: He's making it up to gain an *unfair advantage* over you in sexual -- and possibly financial -- competition. Slip out of his reach!

links.title: Logic: "It's more likely that your father w..."
links.text: It's more likely that your father wasn't even around to beat you.

links.title: Empathy: "It wasn't your father who beat you,..."
links.text: It wasn't your father who beat you, it was the world.

links.title: Measurehead: ""THIS IS A WEAKNESS I CAN EMPATHISE..."
links.text: "THIS IS A WEAKNESS I CAN EMPATHISE WITH. YOU HAVE MY PITY. TAKE SOLACE IN IT."

links.title: You: ""Maybe you're right, maybe my fathe..."
links.text: "Maybe you're right, maybe my father *did* hit me... The thing is, I don't really remember."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU DON'T HAVE TO REMEMBER. YOU AR..."
links.text: "YOU DON'T HAVE TO REMEMBER. YOU ARE LIKE A DOG WITH ITS TAIL BETWEEN ITS LEGS. IT IS VISIBLE TO ALL. IT IS VISIBLE TO WOMEN AND THE REASON WHY YOU HAVEN'T FOUND A WORTHY MATE. OR WHY THE WORTHY MATE WAS STOLEN FROM YOU."

links.title: You: ""This talk about physical violence..."
links.text: "This talk about physical violence between fathers and sons is suddenly making me uncomfortable."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THIS IS BECAUSE YOU STILL CARRY TH..."
links.text: "THIS IS BECAUSE YOU STILL CARRY THE SIGNS OF A VIOLENT PAST. YOU ARE LIKE A DOG WITH ITS TAIL BETWEEN ITS LEGS. IT IS VISIBLE TO ALL. IT IS VISIBLE TO WOMEN AND THE REASON WHY YOU HAVEN'T FOUND A WORTHY MATE. OR WHY THE WORTHY MATE WAS STOLEN FROM YOU."

links.title: You: ""Maybe your father just didn't know..."
links.text: "Maybe your father just didn't know how to express his love?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU ARE NOT FIT TO MAKE ASSUMPTION..."
links.text: "YOU ARE NOT FIT TO MAKE ASSUMPTIONS ABOUT FATHER JAIRZINHO. HIS ABILITY TO FORM EMOTIONAL BONDS WITH HIS OFFSPRING WAS *EXEMPLARY*."

links.title: Measurehead: ""TEACHING SELF-CONTROL, DISCIPLINE,..."
links.text: "TEACHING SELF-CONTROL, DISCIPLINE, ASCESIS, AND RESPECT WAS AN ACT OF LOVE GREATER THAN ANYTHING THAT YOU OR YOUR PHARMACO-THERAPEUTIC CULTURE CAN COME UP WITH."

links.title: Empathy: "Hit him right in the soft spot ther..."
links.text: Hit him right in the soft spot there with that question.

links.title: You: ""Did he teach you some welding at l..."
links.text: "Did he teach you some welding at least?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""NO. I AM NOT INTERESTED IN WELDING.""
links.text: "NO. I AM NOT INTERESTED IN WELDING."

links.title: You: ""Thanks for sharing all this with m..."
links.text: "Thanks for sharing all this with me." (Continue.)

links.title: Measurehead: ""I AM MERELY OFFERING A SMALL GLIMP..."
links.text: "I AM MERELY OFFERING A SMALL GLIMPSE OF FUNCTIONAL FAMILY DYNAMICS -- SOMETHING YOU WERE CLEARLY DEPRIVED OF."

links.title: You: ""I'm sure your dad thinks you're an..."
links.text: "I'm sure your dad thinks you're an apex predator. A top dog."

links.title: Measurehead: ""NO, HE DOES NOT, BUT IT DOESN'T MA..."
links.text: "NO, HE DOES NOT, BUT IT DOESN'T MATTER. I SHOULDN'T CARE -- AND I DON'T -- WHAT HE THINKS. I AM MYSELF, NOT HIM. THIS IS HOW HE TAUGHT ME."

links.title: Logic: "Intellectual independence -- defini..."
links.text: Intellectual independence -- definitely something worth celebrating.

links.title: Empathy: "But deep down he *does* care. Of co..."
links.text: But deep down he *does* care. Of course he does. He's his son.

links.title: You: ""You don't always have to be so *ha..."
links.text: "You don't always have to be so *hard*. Live a little, let loose."

links.title: Measurehead: ""DON'T THINK NOW THAT YOU'VE DIVORC..."
links.text: "DON'T THINK NOW THAT YOU'VE DIVORCED YOURSELF FROM THE GHOUL YOU'RE FIT TO GIVE ME LIFE ADVICE."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I DIDN'T BECOME WHAT I AM BY SUCCU..."
links.text: "I DIDN'T BECOME WHAT I AM BY SUCCUMBING TO THE PLEASURE-SEEKING DEMANDS OF MY PHYSICAL BODY. YOU HOWEVER CLEARLY DID -- AND THAT'S MORE THAN I NEED TO CLOSE THIS ARGUMENT."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I CAN'T SEE OR HEAR THE GREAT EXAM..."
links.text: "I CAN'T SEE OR HEAR THE GREAT EXAMPLE YOU'RE SETTING OVER THE DEAFENING ROAR OF YOUR CO-PILOT, AL GUL."

links.title: You: ""Stop making everything about *me*.""
links.text: "Stop making everything about *me*."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I AM JUST STATING THE FACTS. YOUR..."
links.text: "I AM JUST STATING THE FACTS. YOUR TRAUMATIZED ESSENCE IS IN PLAIN SIGHT."

links.title: You: ""Yes, khm... so, back to babes and..."
links.text: "Yes, khm... so, back to babes and turning back time..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YES, YOUR FAVOURITE TOPICS. WHAT A..."
links.text: "YES, YOUR FAVOURITE TOPICS. WHAT ABOUT THEM?"

links.title: Half Light: "Smells like physical violence..."
links.text: Smells like physical violence...

links.title: You: ""It's very poetic, but you're avoid..."
links.text: "It's very poetic, but you're avoiding the question. How did he raise you?"

links.title: You: ""It's not cowardice, it's called ha..."
links.text: "It's not cowardice, it's called having a survival instinct."

links.title: Measurehead: ""NO. IT'S A BIOLOGICAL CONDITION WH..."
links.text: "NO. IT'S A BIOLOGICAL CONDITION WHERE A MALE SPECIMEN IS BORN WITHOUT HIS TESTICLES. HAPPENS ALL OVER THE WORLD. AND NOW IT HAS HAPPENED HERE, IN MY MOTHER'S OFFICE, UNDER MY WATCHFUL EYE."

links.title: Measurehead: ""SHAME. IT WOULD HAVE BEEN AN INTER..."
links.text: "SHAME. IT WOULD HAVE BEEN AN INTERESTING TOPIC."

links.title: You: ""You seem comfortable here. Do you..."
links.text: "You seem comfortable here. Do you like this place?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YES. I HAVE ALWAYS LIKED THIS PLAC..."
links.text: "YES. I HAVE ALWAYS LIKED THIS PLACE. IT IS MY FAVOURITE. WHEN I WAS A KID I USED TO COME HERE AND WAIT FOR MY MOTHER TO FINISH HER WORK."

links.title: Measurehead: ""GREAT TIMES WERE HAD HERE, FILLING..."
links.text: "GREAT TIMES WERE HAD HERE, FILLING IN THE GREAT COLOURING BOOK OF THE SEMENINE FLORA AND FAUNA. THE CARRION FLOWERS AND THE MONOTREMES. THE MANGROVE FORESTS AND THE MEGABATS."

links.title: Measurehead: ""AND THE COUCH. THE COUCH IS VERY C..."
links.text: "AND THE COUCH. THE COUCH IS VERY COMFORTABLE, EVEN THOUGH IT IS VERY SMALL. THERE IS NO COUCH LIKE THIS ONE."

links.title: Composure: "The couch *does* look very cosy, he..."
links.text: The couch *does* look very cosy, he's right about that.

links.title: You: "(Look around.) "So does your mother..."
links.text: (Look around.) "So does your mother work here?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""NO.""
links.text: "NO."

links.title: You: ""But she used to?""
links.text: "But she used to?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YES.""
links.text: "YES."

links.title: You: ""Oh, did she retire?""
links.text: "Oh, did she retire?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""SHE DID, YES. WITH GREAT HONOURS -..."
links.text: "SHE DID, YES. WITH GREAT HONOURS -- THE GREATEST, SOME SAY. A TRUE MODERN RITUAL."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE ENTIRE ORGANISATION ATTENDED W..."
links.text: "THE ENTIRE ORGANISATION ATTENDED WHEN SHE WAS GIVEN THE HONORARY ENGRAVED PAPERWEIGHT. IT WAS A TENDER DAY."

links.title: Logic: "All 2,372 members? That can't be ri..."
links.text: All 2,372 members? That can't be right...

links.title: Empathy: "Here's a son who absolutely *adores..."
links.text: Here's a son who absolutely *adores* his mother. Adorable!

links.title: Shivers: "Something moves in the depths of yo..."
links.text: Something moves in the depths of your mind, sending shocks of cold through the connective tissue. You're sitting on a kicksled, whizzing through the snow. A warm, kind presence is guiding the sled behind you, her mittened hand resting on your back. You feel very, very loved -- and very, very safe.

links.title: You: ""Mothers are great!""
links.text: "Mothers are great!"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THE GREATEST.""
links.text: "THE GREATEST."

links.title: Authority: "His tone is so solemn that if your..."
links.text: His tone is so solemn that if your eyes were closed, you could swear he has taken a knee.

links.title: You: ""I can barely remember my mother.""
links.text: "I can barely remember my mother."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I AM NOT SURPRISED. YOU ARE LIKE T..."
links.text: "I AM NOT SURPRISED. YOU ARE LIKE THE RUNT OF THE LITTER, ABANDONED. INCAPABLE OF NURTURING A WOMAN'S LOVE. OUR MOTHERS ARE THE ONES WHO TEACH US TO RECEIVE AFFECTION FROM THE OPPOSITE SEX -- A BOND YOU HAVE CLEARLY NOT EXPERIENCED."

links.title: Measurehead: ""INSTEAD YOU HAVE DEVELOPED THIS UN..."
links.text: "INSTEAD YOU HAVE DEVELOPED THIS UNHEALTHY OBSESSION WITH THE PAST. STANDING BEFORE ME, HOPING TO TURN BACK TIME. THIS IS NOT THE ANSWER. REINVENT YOURSELF FROM DEFEAT."

links.title: You: ""I can't remember anything about my..."
links.text: "I can't remember anything about my mother."

links.title: You: ""Apologies, I didn't mean to get so..."
links.text: "Apologies, I didn't mean to get so personal."

links.title: You: ""I am more interested in *babes* th..."
links.text: "I am more interested in *babes* than mothers."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I AM NOT SURPRISED. YOU ARE LIKE T..."
links.text: "I AM NOT SURPRISED. YOU ARE LIKE THE RUNT OF THE LITTER, ABANDONED. INCAPABLE OF NURTURING A WOMAN'S LOVE. OUR MOTHERS ARE THE ONES WHO TEACH US TO RECEIVE AFFECTION FROM THE OPPOSITE SEX -- A BOND YOU HAVE CLEARLY NOT EXPERIENCED."

links.title: Measurehead: ""INSTEAD YOU HAVE DEVELOPED THIS UN..."
links.text: "INSTEAD YOU HAVE DEVELOPED THIS UNHEALTHY OBSESSION WITH BABES. ANY BABES, MINE INCLUDED. THIS IS NOT THE ANSWER."

links.title: Measurehead: ""IT'S NOT TOO LATE YET TO CHANGE TH..."
links.text: "IT'S NOT TOO LATE YET TO CHANGE THE COURSE. YOU HAVE ALREADY GIVEN UP ON AL GUL. NOW GO FURTHER. REINVENT YOURSELF FROM DEFEAT."

links.title: Measurehead: ""IT'S NOT TOO LATE YET TO CHANGE TH..."
links.text: "IT'S NOT TOO LATE YET TO CHANGE THE COURSE. GIVE UP ON AL GUL. THEN GO EVEN FURTHER. REINVENT YOURSELF FROM DEFEAT."

links.title: Shivers: "There should be something here -- a..."
links.text: There should be something here -- a memory, a feeling, even if it's just a glimpse -- but the depths of your psyche remain silent. You don't have a single memory of your mother.

links.title: You: ""She must have passed away. My cond..."
links.text: "She must have passed away. My condolences."

links.title: Measurehead: ""MY MOTHER WILL *NEVER* DIE.""
links.text: "MY MOTHER WILL *NEVER* DIE."

links.title: Volition: "The words are spoken with an unyiel..."
links.text: The words are spoken with an unyielding conviction.

links.title: Measurehead: ""SHE RETIRED. WITH GREAT HONOURS --..."
links.text: "SHE RETIRED. WITH GREAT HONOURS -- THE GREATEST, SOME SAY. A TRUE MODERN RITUAL."

links.title: You: ""Sorry, I didn't mean to pry.""
links.text: "Sorry, I didn't mean to pry."

links.title: Measurehead: ""BUT YOU DID. AND THEN YOUR TESTICL..."
links.text: "BUT YOU DID. AND THEN YOUR TESTICLES SHRUNK AND RETREATED INSIDE YOUR RECTUM."

links.title: Physical Instrument: "This is *not* physiologically accur..."
links.text: This is *not* physiologically accurate...

links.title: Measurehead: ""DO YOU KNOW WHO HAS ABSOLUTELY *NO..."
links.text: "DO YOU KNOW WHO HAS ABSOLUTELY *NO* RESPECT FOR THIS TYPE OF PHYSIOLOGICAL METAMORPHOSIS?"

links.title: Reaction Speed: "Wome...?"
links.text: Wome...?

links.title: Measurehead: ""WOMEN," he answers his own questio..."
links.text: "WOMEN," he answers his own question. "THEY HATE IT. SEE YOU UNFIT FOR A SPIRITUAL CONNECTION. WOMEN CAN MAKE YOU STRONGER, BUT ONLY IF YOUR LACK OF CONFIDENCE DOES NOT GET IN THE WAY FIRST."

links.title: Half Light: "Please just agree with him -- you'r..."
links.text: Please just agree with him -- you're in the cage of a Semenese tiger. At his mercy. He can *end* you any time he chooses.

links.title: You: ""About knocking you out earlier...""
links.text: "About knocking you out earlier..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""DON'T APOLOGISE. MY WOMEN LIKED IT..."
links.text: "DON'T APOLOGISE. MY WOMEN LIKED IT. IT IS IMPORTANT TO APPEAR VULNERABLE SOMETIMES. VULNERABILITY NURTURES EMOTIONAL CONTACT."

links.title: Measurehead: ""EMOTIONAL CONTACT AMPLIFIES THE EC..."
links.text: "EMOTIONAL CONTACT AMPLIFIES THE ECSTASIES OF SEX. LIKE IVY, WE ARE INTERTWINED. WEAK AND STRONG, MAN AND WOMAN, MOTHER AND CHILD.

links.title: Electrochemistry: "Wow. This man has truly internalise..."
links.text: Wow. This man has truly internalised the psychology of sex.

links.title: You: ""I really *must* return to the past..."
links.text: "I really *must* return to the past now." (Continue.)

links.title: Measurehead: ""CLEARLY IT IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR YOU T..."
links.text: "CLEARLY IT IS IMPOSSIBLE FOR YOU TO SHED YOUR NEUROTIC OBSESSION. THIS WAILING FOR THE PAST IS A TASK UNFIT FOR MEN. IT IS BETTER LEFT FOR WIDOWS, MOURNING THEIR HUSBANDS -- AND FOR MENTALLY ILL COMMUNISTS MOURNING THEIR COMMUNE."

links.title: Measurehead: ""IF YOU WANT ADVICE ON BABES -- OR..."
links.text: "IF YOU WANT ADVICE ON BABES -- OR THE MYSTERIES OF LIFE -- OR EVEN ON REVACHOL -- LOOK FORWARD. TO ESCAPE YOUR DEFEATED STATE YOU NEED TO MOVE FORWARD. ONTO FUTURE VICTORIES."

links.title: Rhetoric: "But isn't he a traditionalist?! Why..."
links.text: But isn't he a traditionalist?! Why does he keep talking about future...

links.title: You: ""Wait, I thought you were a traditi..."
links.text: "Wait, I thought you were a traditionalist..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""I AM NOT A *TRADITIONAL* TRADITION..."
links.text: "I AM NOT A *TRADITIONAL* TRADITIONALIST. LIFE ON THIS PLANET DOES NOT MOVE BACKWARDS. THE IVY MOVES FORWARD, COVERING THE WHOLE DOOR. THE FLOWERS GROW OUTWARD, COVERING THE WHOLE MEADOW. NOTHING GROWS *AGAINST* TIME AND SPACE. ONLY ALONG ITS LAYLINES CAN NATURE PROGRESS."

links.title: You: ""You don't get it. I need to bring..."
links.text: "You don't get it. I need to bring disco back -- from the Thirties."

links.title: Measurehead: ""IT SEEMS TO ME YOU ARE IN NEED OF..."
links.text: "IT SEEMS TO ME YOU ARE IN NEED OF A WARNING. HERE IT IS: IT IS ABSOLUTELY POSSIBLE TO RETURN TO THE PAST. YOU JUST NEED TO TAKE A TICKET TO SEREGLEE ISLAND, THE SOUTHERNMOST OF THE SEMENINE ARCHIPELAGO, ALSO KNOWN AS ILE DU FANTÔME. AND WALK INTO PALE."

links.title: Measurehead: ""LET IT DITHER AND ROT YOUR MIND. T..."
links.text: "LET IT DITHER AND ROT YOUR MIND. THEN YOU CAN MARINATE FOREVER IN YOUR IRREVERSABLE DEFEAT. WHILE RACE ENEMIES LAUGH AT YOUR MOTIONLESS, GAP-MOUTHED CORPSE."

links.title: Half Light: "No, no... this does *not* sound inv..."
links.text: No, no... this does *not* sound inviting!

links.title: Logic: "Where would you even get a ticket?..."
links.text: Where would you even get a ticket? You can't just pack your bags and leave.

links.title: Inland Empire: "Finally -- a chance to connect with..."
links.text: Finally -- a chance to connect with the *divine*.

links.title: Perception: "It gets very cold in the office, li..."
links.text: It gets very cold in the office, like in a desert after the nightfall...

links.title: You: ""Wait, what's pale?""
links.text: "Wait, what's pale?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU WANT TO RETURN TO THE PAST AND..."
links.text: "YOU WANT TO RETURN TO THE PAST AND YOU DON'T EVEN KNOW WHAT YOU'RE FACING." He stops, momentarily speechless.

links.title: Measurehead: ""MAYBE IT'S FOR THE BEST. IT IS TOO..."
links.text: "MAYBE IT'S FOR THE BEST. IT IS TOO LATE TO EXPLAIN THE INTRICACIES OF THE REALITY-RHIZOME IF THE OPPORTUNITY TO LEARN ITS FUNDAMENTAL TERMS HAS PASSED YOU. TREAT THE PALE AS A MYSTERY -- DARK, REPULSIVE, AND SURPRISINGLY MUNDANE -- LIKE CURDLING MILK OR A MOULDING NECTARINE."

links.title: Measurehead: ""OR GO AND SEE IT FOR YOURSELF. WAT..."
links.text: "OR GO AND SEE IT FOR YOURSELF. WATCH IT RISE FROM THE SAND AND THE SKY, TAKING CORAL REEFS IN ITS BOSOM."

links.title: You: ""Cool, where do I get the tickets?""
links.text: "Cool, where do I get the tickets?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""BEFORE YOU GO LOOKING FOR TICKETS,..."
links.text: "BEFORE YOU GO LOOKING FOR TICKETS, I SUGGEST YOU SEE WHAT IT DOES TO A MAN. THE GHOUL IS A CRUEL MASTER, BUT IT IS NOT PALE. PALE TAKES YOUR MIND AND REJECTS THE FLESH. IT IS CAPRICIOUS AND TERRIFYING, LIKE A VIRGIN. YOU WILL LOSE YOUR COURAGE BEFORE HER FACE."

links.title: Measurehead: ""GO HAVE A LOOK," he gestures towar..."
links.text: "GO HAVE A LOOK," he gestures toward the intersection. "THE WHITE-HAIRED PROTEIN MASS AT THE INTERSECTION. A LORRY DRIVER. IMPOSSIBLE TO MISS HER IF YOU'RE EVEN A HALF-DECENT COP."

links.title: You: ""A protein mass?""
links.text: "A protein mass?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""AN EMPTY VESSEL THE MIND HAS DESER..."
links.text: "AN EMPTY VESSEL THE MIND HAS DESERTED. A HUSK, NO LONGER INHABITED BY A CONSCIOUSNESS. BIOLOGICAL WASTE."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Ah yes, 'protein mass' -- a scienti..."
links.text: Ah yes, 'protein mass' -- a scientific term from Graad, for a person terminally overexposed to the pale. Mouth open, catatonic, completely unable to return to the present.

links.title: Conceptualization: "This goes far beyond your conceptua..."
links.text: This goes far beyond your conceptual reach... beyond the conceptual reach of *anyone*, really.

links.title: Shivers: "A chill races down your spine."
links.text: A chill races down your spine.

links.title: You: ""Paledriver? Yes, we already discus..."
links.text: "Paledriver? Yes, we already discussed pale and its many effects."

links.title: Measurehead: ""AND YET YOU'RE STILL OBSESSED WITH..."
links.text: "AND YET YOU'RE STILL OBSESSED WITH TURNING BACK TIME? AFTER YOU'VE SEEN WHAT IT DOES TO A MAN?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""A PIECE OF ADVICE..." The big man..."
links.text: "A PIECE OF ADVICE..." The big man leans forward. "STOP FIGHTING TIME AND FACE THE *REAL* ANTAGONIST. FACE *YOURSELF*, PUPA. IT'S A SHOWDOWN EVERY MAN MUST GO THROUGH."

links.title: Measurehead: ""WE ARE DONE HERE. AND *REMEMBER*,..."
links.text: "WE ARE DONE HERE. AND *REMEMBER*, WHAT HAPPENS IN MY MOTHER'S OFFICE, STAYS IN MY MOTHER'S OFFICE. QUIET CONTEMPLATION ENDS, BIOLOGICAL RIVALRY RESUMES."

links.title: Measurehead: ""WE ARE DONE HERE. AND *REMEMBER*,..."
links.text: "WE ARE DONE HERE. AND *REMEMBER*, WHAT HAPPENS IN MY MOTHER'S OFFICE, STAYS IN MY MOTHER'S OFFICE. QUIET CONTEMPLATION ENDS, BIOLOGICAL RIVALRY RESUMES."

links.title: You: ""Paledriver? Yes, I've already talk..."
links.text: "Paledriver? Yes, I've already talked to her."

links.title: Measurehead: ""GO TALK WITH HER AGAIN. ASK HER AB..."
links.text: "GO TALK WITH HER AGAIN. ASK HER ABOUT PALE. SEE WHAT A RELENTLESS OBSESSION WITH THE PAST DOES TO A MAN."

links.title: You: ""Paledriver? I tried talking to her..."
links.text: "Paledriver? I tried talking to her, but didn't get very far."

links.title: Measurehead: ""YOU NEED TO BE MORE FORCEFUL. TALK..."
links.text: "YOU NEED TO BE MORE FORCEFUL. TALK TO HER AGAIN -- ABOUT THE ONLY THING THAT STILL MATTERS TO THIS EMPTY VESSEL -- PALE."

links.title: You: ""Are you saying one of the *lorry d..."
links.text: "Are you saying one of the *lorry drivers* knows how to turn back time?"

links.title: Measurehead: ""THIS ONE IS NOT LIKE THE OTHERS. G..."
links.text: "THIS ONE IS NOT LIKE THE OTHERS. GO FIND HER. SEE WHAT A RELENTLESS OBSESSION WITH THE PAST DOES TO A MAN."

links.title: You: ""Alright, I'll go check her out the..."
links.text: "Alright, I'll go check her out then." [Leave.]

links.title: Measurehead: ""YES. OUR LITTLE MEETING HAS FINISH..."
links.text: "YES. OUR LITTLE MEETING HAS FINISHED. IT'S TIME TO LEAVE MY MOTHER'S OFFICE AND RETURN TO OUR JOBS. I HOPE THIS HAS BEEN ILLUMINATING TO YOU."

links.title: Measurehead: ""AND REMEMBER. WHAT HAPPENS IN MY M..."
links.text: "AND REMEMBER. WHAT HAPPENS IN MY MOM'S OFFICE, STAYS IN MY MOM'S OFFICE. QUIET CONTEMPLATION ENDS, BIOLOGICAL RIVALRY RESUMES."

links.title: Measurehead: ""AND REMEMBER. WHAT HAPPENS IN MY M..."
links.text: "AND REMEMBER. WHAT HAPPENS IN MY MOM'S OFFICE, STAYS IN MY MOM'S OFFICE. QUIET CONTEMPLATION ENDS, BIOLOGICAL RIVALRY RESUMES."

links.title: You: ""Why do I have the feeling there's..."
links.text: "Why do I have the feeling there's a catch..."

links.title: Measurehead: ""THERE IS NO CATCH. YOU WILL GET WH..."
links.text: "THERE IS NO CATCH. YOU WILL GET WHAT YOU WANT. THE GHOUL IS A CRUEL MASTER, BUT IT IS NOT PALE. PALE TAKES YOUR MIND AND REJECTS THE FLESH. IT IS CAPRICIOUS AND TERRIFYING, LIKE A VIRGIN. YOU WILL LOSE YOUR COURAGE BEFORE HER FACE."

links.title: Encyclopedia: "You still haven't found out about p..."
links.text: You still haven't found out about pale, but it certainly doesn't sound inviting...

links.title: Encyclopedia: "Pale? What is pale... it does *not*..."
links.text: Pale? What is pale... it does *not* sound inviting.

links.title: You: ""It's about the Suzerain. He's coun..."
links.text: "It's about the Suzerain. He's counting on me."

links.title: You: ""I’m still convicned the babes were..."
links.text: "I’m still convicned the babes were more *faithful* in the past. They stuck with their men."

links.title: You: ""Maybe you're right, but I won't kn..."
links.text: "Maybe you're right, but I won't know it until I've tried the impossible."

links.title: You: ""It's about her." (Nod solemnly.) "..."
links.text: "It's about her." (Nod solemnly.) "Revachol."

links.title: You: ""I *really* need to find a way to t..."
links.text: "I *really* need to find a way to turn back time."

links.title: Measurehead: ""WE ALREADY ESTABLISHED THAT. TELL..."
links.text: "WE ALREADY ESTABLISHED THAT. TELL ME, WHAT DRIVES YOU TO SEARCH FOR SUCH *FANTASTIC* MEASURES?"

links.title: You: "(Shrug.) "No reason, I just want to..."
links.text: (Shrug.) "No reason, I just want to turn back time."

links.title: You: ""I don't really like women.""
links.text: "I don't really like women."

links.title: Measurehead: ""AND? THAT'S WHAT YOU WANTED TO TAL..."
links.text: "AND? THAT'S WHAT YOU WANTED TO TALK ABOUT? THAT YOU DON'T LIKE WOMEN?"

links.title: You: ""I don't really like women, only th..."
links.text: "I don't really like women, only their rights."

links.title: Measurehead: ""AND? THAT'S WHAT YOU WANTED TO TAL..."
links.text: "AND? THAT'S WHAT YOU WANTED TO TALK ABOUT? THAT YOU ARE A DISTURBED GENDER PARITY ACTIVIST?"
